author: ddas
msg: MAPREDUCE-1331. Fixes a typo in a testcase. Contributed by Devaraj Das.

author: woonsan
msg: Admin functionality to mark a portlet as out-of-service.
If administrator set a metadata, named "service.out", with value of "true" for a portlet definition, then the portlet will be displayed as "out-of-service".

The out-of-service message can be customized in the spring assembly configuration, "aggregation.xml", for the bean of "PortletRendererImpl" by adding the 'outOfServiceMessage' property like the following example:
